name: Pending Purchase Request from - CTO Sir
query:
SELECT
    name,
    date,
    DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), date) AS Elapsed_Days,
    emp_name,
    division,
    branch,
    select_department,
    cto_status
FROM `tabPurchase Requisition`
WHERE status IN ('Pending from CTO')
AND select_department = 'IT'
AND status = 'Pending from CTO'
ORDER BY Elapsed_Days DESC;
report_name: Pending Purchase Request from - CTO Sir
